title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Curriculum Materials               Curriculum Materials        Sunset Point during a winter storm. Photographed by Dan McLaughlin 1 February, 2016.   Â    Nonverbal Information Packets These resources are available to educators, home-schoolers, students, and provides material useful for bulletin boards, teacher files and school reports. It includes the park newspaper, a map and guide, the geology of Bryce Canyon, checklists of the local birds, plants and mammals, a cultural history publication and a postcard. These materials are available for downloading by clicking on the title of the item you desire.  Bird List (PDF 1.93 mb) Combined Mammal/Reptile List (PDF 1 mb)current Hoodoo Park Map  If you find that these items are taking too long to download or you can't find what you are looking for, email us and we will gladly help you out. Response time may be up to 2 weeks after receipt of your request, please plan ahead. Adobe Reader may be needed to view some of these documents, it is available here for free downloading.
